Why do we continue to apologize for speaking out?  It is the rebels and the outcasts that ultimately jump the curve and create great change.  Are you encouraging your organization to show their rebel spirit to encourage greater innovation and creativity or are you satisfied to sit in mediocrity?  Of course, the greatest change happens through the rebel who creates consensus to grow something into a revolution.  We are overdue for serious disruption to the HR practice, to the way people behave (and less focus on how others marginalize), the way that we interact and contribute.  Be a rebel, join the revolution.  @rulesmakerebels @illumin8az #hr #Humanresources

Epica IT, is a Software Development Firm headquartered in Phoenix AZ. Our business model, enables for startups and small businesses here in the US to have access to a highly professional team with an emphasis in agile software development and lean startup principles at very competitive prices. Epica is based on the premise that it is possible to consistently push software releases in a confortable time zone and manage projects domestically in the US while turning production into full time ROWE job opportunities for talented people in emerging technology hubs along Latin America in order to promote Social end Economical change within such regions.

Lifestyle Blog about the Cosmopolitan life of the Affluent Latino in the Valley of the Sun. A collaborative effort of three professional women from different backgrouns, that provides us with three completely different perspectives and versions of the Affluent Latino lifestyle and with that a very broad view of the socio-economic and cultural phenomenon of this particular demographic in this particular geographic area.

summary: Bilingual Business Development Professional currently leading Product Refining Phase for Epica IT a startup based in Tempe AZ, that aims to connect startups and small businesses in the US to cost effective software development options while bringing tech job opportunities to emerging technology hubs along Latin America in a R.O.W.E. / teleworking setup in order to promote Social end Economical change within such regions. Key abilities / skills:- Graphic, UX and Web Design, Brand Development, Strategic Planning, Project Planning, Lean Startup, Agile Product Development- Keen ability to enter a new industry and understand it's inner workings in order to find creative solutions to business challenges. Experience Highlights: - Executive experience on B2B setups for projects ranging from, IPO Branding Planning/Implementation and subsequent Branding for Investor Relations, Strategic Planning, Project Management for Loyalty Programs, Social Responsibility endeavors and Corporate Culture Shift. - Executive experience in on B2C setups in Product Pitch in order to attain government funding, Product & Experience Design.- Consultancy experience on B2C in Product Development (MVP's), Brand Development, Online Positioning and Non-Profit re-branding.
